sense.def:
A lapse
je kratkotrajno slabo vedenje osebe, ki se navadno vede lepo.

seg.quote: I intended to make up for this lapse in manners at the next party.

sense.def:
To have a lapse of memory
ali
to have a lapse of concentration
pomeni pozabiti nekaj storiti ali se ne osredotočiti na nekaj.

To lapse into a particular kind of behaviour
pomeni začeti se vesti na določen način.

seg.quote: He lapsed into an unhappy silence.

sense.def:
A lapse of time
je obdobje, ki je dovolj dolgo, da se položaj spremeni.

seg.quote: After a certain lapse of time it would be safe for Daisy to return.
He was not conscious of the time lapse.
Hours lapsed between each phone call.

sense.def:
Kadar položaj, razmerje ali zakonska pogodba
lapses
, se lahko konča ali postane neveljavna.
